About

I'm a senior Experience Designer with over ten years in the Digital Design field. I am experienced in the entire range of UX, but also dabble in UI Design, Branding & logo design and recently completed a front end development course, so that I can begin to overcome my sadness for the demise of AS3. You can check out my cv here
